title: What is the relationship between kundalini and non-verbal hypnosis? / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret shares unique secrets about non-verbal hypnosis, as he answers the question "What is the relationship between kundalini and non-verbal hypnosis?". The images are from his non-verbal hypnosis masterclass, where his students experienced strong hypnotic ecstasy in a forest, where they can connect with nature. Dr. Paret is the main authority in Non-verbal hypnosis, Mesmerism and Fascination and he teaches techniques, that deeply transform people. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
